bug.author: myungjoo
bug.description: With meson 0.50, compiler checks are more strict: <denchmark-code>ninja: Entering directory `build' [1/9] Generating copy-bmp2png with a custom command. [2/9] Compiling C++ object 'tests/59830eb@@unittest_common@exe/common_unittest_common.cpp.o'. FAILED: tests/59830eb@@unittest_common@exe/common_unittest_common.cpp.o c++ -Itests/59830eb@@unittest_common@exe -Itests -I../tests -Igst/nnstreamer -I../gst/nnstreamer -Igst/nnstreamer/tensor_transform -I/usr/include/glib-2.0 -I/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/glib-2.0/include -I/usr/local/include/gstreamer-1.0 -I/usr/include/orc-0.4 -I/usr/src/gtest -I/usr/src/gtest/include -fdiagnostics-color=always -pipe -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -Wall -Winvalid-pch -Wnon-virtual-dtor -Werror -std=c++11 -g '-DVERSION="0.1.3"' -DHAVE_ORC=1 -DENABLE_TENSORFLOW=1 -DENABLE_TENSORFLOW_LITE=1 -pthread -MD -MQ 'tests/59830eb@@unittest_common@exe/common_unittest_common.cpp.o' -MF 'tests/59830eb@@unittest_common@exe/common_unittest_common.cpp.o.d' -o 'tests/59830eb@@unittest_common@exe/common_unittest_common.cpp.o' -c ../tests/common/unittest_common.cpp In file included from ../tests/common/unittest_common.cpp:16:0: /usr/src/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h: In instantiation of ?쁳esting::AssertionResult testing::internal::CmpHelperEQ(const char*, const char*, const T1&, const T2&) [with T1 = unsigned int; T2 = int]?? /usr/src/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h:1421:23: required from ?쁲tatic testing::AssertionResult testing::internal::EqHelper<lhs_is_null_literal>::Compare(const char*, const char*, const T1&, const T2&) [with T1 = unsigned int; T2 = int; bool lhs_is_null_literal = false]?? ../tests/common/unittest_common.cpp:184:3: required from here /usr/src/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h:1392:11: error: comparison between signed and unsigned integer expressions [-Werror=sign-compare] if (lhs == rhs) { ~~~~^~~~~~ cc1plus: all warnings being treated as errors [3/9] Compiling C++ object 'tests/59830eb@@unittest_src_iio@exe/nnstreamer_source_unittest_src_iio.cpp.o'. FAILED: tests/59830eb@@unittest_src_iio@exe/nnstreamer_source_unittest_src_iio.cpp.o c++ -Itests/59830eb@@unittest_src_iio@exe -Itests -I../tests -Igst/nnstreamer -I../gst/nnstreamer -Igst/nnstreamer/tensor_transform -I/usr/include/glib-2.0 -I/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/glib-2.0/include -I/usr/local/include/gstreamer-1.0 -I/usr/include/orc-0.4 -I/usr/src/gtest -I/usr/src/gtest/include -fdiagnostics-color=always -pipe -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -Wall -Winvalid-pch -Wnon-virtual-dtor -Werror -std=c++11 -g '-DVERSION="0.1.3"' -DHAVE_ORC=1 -DENABLE_TENSORFLOW=1 -DENABLE_TENSORFLOW_LITE=1 -pthread -MD -MQ 'tests/59830eb@@unittest_src_iio@exe/nnstreamer_source_unittest_src_iio.cpp.o' -MF 'tests/59830eb@@unittest_src_iio@exe/nnstreamer_source_unittest_src_iio.cpp.o.d' -o 'tests/59830eb@@unittest_src_iio@exe/nnstreamer_source_unittest_src_iio.cpp.o' -c ../tests/nnstreamer_source/unittest_src_iio.cpp In file included from ../tests/nnstreamer_source/unittest_src_iio.cpp:10:0: /usr/src/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h: In instantiation of ?쁳esting::AssertionResult testing::internal::CmpHelperEQ(const char*, const char*, const T1&, const T2&) [with T1 = unsigned int; T2 = int]?? /usr/src/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h:1421:23: required from ?쁲tatic testing::AssertionResult testing::internal::EqHelper<lhs_is_null_literal>::Compare(const char*, const char*, const T1&, const T2&) [with T1 = unsigned int; T2 = int; bool lhs_is_null_literal = false]?? ../tests/nnstreamer_source/unittest_src_iio.cpp:874:3: required from here /usr/src/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h:1392:11: error: comparison between signed and unsigned integer expressions [-Werror=sign-compare] if (lhs == rhs) { ~~~~^~~~~~ /usr/src/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h: In instantiation of ?쁳esting::AssertionResult testing::internal::CmpHelperEQ(const char*, const char*, const T1&, const T2&) [with T1 = long unsigned int; T2 = int]?? /usr/src/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h:1421:23: required from ?쁲tatic testing::AssertionResult testing::internal::EqHelper<lhs_is_null_literal>::Compare(const char*, const char*, const T1&, const T2&) [with T1 = long unsigned int; T2 = int; bool lhs_is_null_literal = false]?? ../tests/nnstreamer_source/unittest_src_iio.cpp:882:3: required from here /usr/src/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h:1392:11: error: comparison between signed and unsigned integer expressions [-Werror=sign-compare] cc1plus: all warnings being treated as errors [4/9] Compiling C++ object 'tests/59830eb@@unittest_plugins@exe/nnstreamer_plugins_unittest_plugins.cpp.o'. FAILED: tests/59830eb@@unittest_plugins@exe/nnstreamer_plugins_unittest_plugins.cpp.o c++ -Itests/59830eb@@unittest_plugins@exe -Itests -I../tests -Igst/nnstreamer -I../gst/nnstreamer -Igst/nnstreamer/tensor_transform -I/usr/include/glib-2.0 -I/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/glib-2.0/include -I/usr/local/include/gstreamer-1.0 -I/usr/include/orc-0.4 -I/usr/src/gtest -I/usr/src/gtest/include -fdiagnostics-color=always -pipe -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -Wall -Winvalid-pch -Wnon-virtual-dtor -Werror -std=c++11 -g '-DVERSION="0.1.3"' -DHAVE_ORC=1 -DENABLE_TENSORFLOW=1 -DENABLE_TENSORFLOW_LITE=1 -pthread -MD -MQ 'tests/59830eb@@unittest_plugins@exe/nnstreamer_plugins_unittest_plugins.cpp.o' -MF 'tests/59830eb@@unittest_plugins@exe/nnstreamer_plugins_unittest_plugins.cpp.o.d' -o 'tests/59830eb@@unittest_plugins@exe/nnstreamer_plugins_unittest_plugins.cpp.o' -c ../tests/nnstreamer_plugins/unittest_plugins.cpp In file included from ../tests/nnstreamer_plugins/unittest_plugins.cpp:11:0: /usr/src/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h: In instantiation of ?쁳esting::AssertionResult testing::internal::CmpHelperEQ(const char*, const char*, const T1&, const T2&) [with T1 = unsigned int; T2 = int]?? /usr/src/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h:1421:23: required from ?쁲tatic testing::AssertionResult testing::internal::EqHelper<lhs_is_null_literal>::Compare(const char*, const char*, const T1&, const T2&) [with T1 = unsigned int; T2 = int; bool lhs_is_null_literal = false]?? /usr/src/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h:1421:23: required from ?쁲tatic testing::AssertionResult testing::internal::EqHelper<lhs_is_null_literal>::Compare(const char*, const char*, const T1&, const T2&) [with T1 = signed char; T2 = unsigned int; bool lhs_is_null_literal = false]?? ../tests/nnstreamer_plugins/unittest_plugins.cpp:1604:5: required from here /usr/src/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h:1392:11: error: comparison between signed and unsigned integer expressions [-Werror=sign-compare] /usr/src/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h: In instantiation of ?쁳esting::AssertionResult testing::internal::CmpHelperEQ(const char*, const char*, const T1&, const T2&) [with T1 = short int; T2 = unsigned int]?? /usr/src/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h:1421:23: required from ?쁲tatic testing::AssertionResult testing::internal::EqHelper<lhs_is_null_literal>::Compare(const char*, const char*, const T1&, const T2&) [with T1 = short int; T2 = unsigned int; bool lhs_is_null_literal = false]?? /usr/src/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h:1421:23: required from ?쁲tatic testing::AssertionResult testing::internal::EqHelper<lhs_is_null_literal>::Compare(const char*, const char*, const T1&, const T2&) [with T1 = int; T2 = unsigned int; bool lhs_is_null_literal = false]?? FAILED: tests/59830eb@@unittest_sink@exe/nnstreamer_sink_unittest_sink.cpp.o c++ -Itests/59830eb@@unittest_sink@exe -Itests -I../tests -Igst/nnstreamer -I../gst/nnstreamer -Igst/nnstreamer/tensor_transform -I/usr/include/glib-2.0 -I/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/glib-2.0/include -I/usr/local/include/gstreamer-1.0 -I/usr/include/orc-0.4 -I/usr/src/gtest -I/usr/src/gtest/include -fdiagnostics-color=always -pipe -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -Wall -Winvalid-pch -Wnon-virtual-dtor -Werror -std=c++11 -g '-DVERSION="0.1.3"' -DHAVE_ORC=1 -DENABLE_TENSORFLOW=1 -DENABLE_TENSORFLOW_LITE=1 -pthread -MD -MQ 'tests/59830eb@@unittest_sink@exe/nnstreamer_sink_unittest_sink.cpp.o' -MF 'tests/59830eb@@unittest_sink@exe/nnstreamer_sink_unittest_sink.cpp.o.d' -o 'tests/59830eb@@unittest_sink@exe/nnstreamer_sink_unittest_sink.cpp.o' -c ../tests/nnstreamer_sink/unittest_sink.cpp In file included from ../tests/nnstreamer_sink/unittest_sink.cpp:12:0: /usr/src/gtest/include/gtest/gtest.h: In instantiation of ?쁳esting::AssertionResult testing::internal::CmpHelperEQ(const char*, const char*, const T1&, const T2&) [with T1 = unsigned int; T2 = int]?? comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1380>#1380</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
: Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1380>#1380</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/myungjoo>@myungjoo</denchmark-link> In my case, there are no such errors while I am building nnstreamer using meson 0.50.999. $ meson --version 0.50.999 $ meson build The Meson build system Version: 0.50.999 Source dir: /home/wook/Work/prj_nnstreamer/nnstreamer Build dir: /home/wook/Work/prj_nnstreamer/nnstreamer/build Build type: native build Project name: nnstreamer Project version: 0.1.3 Native C compiler: ccache cc (gcc 5.4.0 "cc (Ubuntu 5.4.0-6ubuntu1~16.04.11) 5.4.0 20160609") Native C++ compiler: ccache c++ (gcc 5.4.0 "c++ (Ubuntu 5.4.0-6ubuntu1~16.04.11) 5.4.0 20160609") Build machine cpu family: x86_64 Build machine cpu: x86_64 Found pkg-config: /usr/bin/pkg-config (0.29.1) Dependency glib-2.0 found: YES 2.48.2 Dependency gstreamer-1.0 found: YES 1.8.3 Dependency gstreamer-base-1.0 found: YES 1.8.3 Dependency gstreamer-controller-1.0 found: YES 1.8.3 Dependency gstreamer-video-1.0 found: YES 1.8.3 Dependency gstreamer-audio-1.0 found: YES 1.8.3 Dependency gstreamer-app-1.0 found: YES 1.8.3 Dependency gstreamer-check-1.0 found: YES 1.8.3 Library m found: YES Library dl found: YES Dependency threads found: YES Dependency orc-0.4 found: YES 0.4.25 Program orcc found: YES (/usr/bin/orcc) Dependency tensorflow found: YES 1.9.0 Dependency protobuf found: YES 3.6.1 Dependency tensorflow-lite found: YES 0.1 Dependency opencv found: YES 2.4.9.1 Dependency libpng found: YES 1.2.54 Program cp found: YES (/bin/cp) Dependency GTest found: YES (building self) WARNING: Project targetting '>=0.40.0' but tried to use feature introduced in '0.50.0': install arg in configure_file Configuring nnstreamer.ini using configuration Configuring nnstreamer.pc using configuration Build targets in project: 32 WARNING: Project specifies a minimum meson_version '>=0.40.0' but uses features which were added in newer versions: * 0.50.0: {'install arg in configure_file'} Found ninja-1.8.2 at /usr/bin/ninja $ ninja -C build ninja: Entering directory `build' [108/108] Linking target ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/libnnstreamer_filter_tensorflow.so.

In the build log, <denchmark-code>WARNING: Project specifies a minimum meson_version '>=0.40.0' but uses features which were added in newer versions: * 0.50.0: {'install arg in configure_file'} </denchmark-code>
meson supports the arg install in configure_file() from ver-0.50, and it is unnecessary argument. I will add new PR about this warning later.
@nnsuite/nnstreamer Meson 0.50.1 is ready on our PPA and I confirmed that there are no warnings and errors during the build for arm64, armhf, and amd64. We can close this issue.
